summary: Completed Phase 3 testing - SOW Management and Kick-off Meeting features. All 12 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tested and working correctly with Schedule Dialog and Add Scope Item dialogs.

issues: Console warning: <span> cannot be child of <option> - minor React hydration warning in consultant select dropdown (same issue as ProjectTasks.js)

action_items: Minor: Fix React hydration warning in KickoffMeeting.js consultant select dropdown (span inside option tag)
critical_code_review_comments: SOW categories correctly implemented with all 6 types (sales, hr, operations, training, analytics, digital_marketing)
SOW freeze logic working correctly - non-admin users blocked, admin can override
Kick-off meeting scheduling correctly adds Principal Consultant, Sales Executive, and Client Contact as attendees
Notifications created when kick-off is scheduled for sales executive
agreement_id is required (not Optional) in KickoffMeetingCreate - projects need linked agreements for kickoff scheduling
seed_data_creation: Created kickoff meeting for Digital Transformation Initiative project with approved agreement AGR-2026-0001. Created SOW entries with items. Created TEST_Kickoff_Dialog_Project for UI testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 3 SOW and Kickoff Meeting features fully tested. Project 'Digital Transformation Initiative' (337013ab-f45d-47ef-ad9d-1f92fb314e21) has scheduled kickoff meeting (787f8d81-dd17-4548-bf15-90eeb0323b8d) with frozen SOW. Agreement AGR-2026-0001 used for kickoff. Consultants Rajiv Kumar and Priya Sharma available. SOW has 2 items in Sales category (frozen).

features_tested.POST /api/kickoff-meetings: PASSED - Schedules meeting and freezes SOW
features_tested.GET /api/kickoff-meetings/{id}: PASSED - Returns full meeting with SOW summary
features_tested.SOW Edit by admin: PASSED - Admin can edit frozen SOW
features_tested.Kick-off page UI: PASSED - Shows SOW categories, meeting details, attendees
features_tested.Schedule Dialog UI: PASSED - All fields present (date, time, mode, consultant, attendees, agenda)
features_tested.Add Scope Item Dialog: PASSED - Title, description, deliverables, timeline fields working
